$interpreted: Angelia: So, both headmasters have been taken hostage by the Dracontines?
Tica: Exactly! And Headmaster Balzac's injury is serious. If we wait any longer she's gonna go bye-bye. We've got to get in there and save them!
Feiz: Absolutely not, Your Majesty. It could be a trap. The Rune Academy and Elio are working together to lure you in.
Tica: I'm telling you the truth!
Tica: I may screw around, but I wouldn't joke about the headmaster's life!
Feiz: Hard to say, who knows you're not acting!?
Angelia: ...When I was in the desert, I saw the terrible things the Dracontines were capable of.
Angelia: I understand General Feiz's concerns, but the Dracontines are the enemy of all that reside on this continent.
Angelia: Take stock of the troops; we'll put everything into helping the Rune Academy.
Angelia: As for Elio, we'll deal with that after this looming threat has been taken care of.
Naya: Yes, ma'am!
Feiz: Your Majesty!
Angelia: That's an order.
Feiz: ...Obeyed...
Angelia: Tica, lead the way.
Tica: No problem〜Come with me!
Charle: ...*gasp*...
Zola: Hehe, feeling the pain?
Zola: Relax, I'm very angry now, so I'll be real slow with the torture〜
Charle: Ugh!
Morris: Woman, didn't I say observe until the morning!?
Morris: You dumb idiot, you've ruined my experiment!
Zola: Quit using that face to order me around, Morris Dietrich!
Dracontine: Master Zola, it's not looking good!
Zola: ...The Queen of the Kingdom of the Sun and her army?
Zola: Everyone in the Carlos family is the same, they'll do whatever it takes to steal from others...
Zola: I'll hand this honorable mission over to you, new Immortal.
Zola: Use this to blow all of those who know the secret of the Dracontines to pieces〜
Morris: This...?
Zola: Don't worry, the explosive range of this little thing won't hurt you. Just enough for their wretched deaths to serve as a warning.
Zola: Nothing but a fraud. Don't try any annoying, off-limit research now〜
Zola: Ah〜It'd be wonderful if no one dared come study at this Academy after this〜
Aosta: What idiotic words...
Zola: What's idiotic is this world which knows nothing.
Zola: So long as they remain idiots, controlled by the sect like good little boys and girls〜
Aosta: You...
Morris: It's not the monkey's turn to speak.
Aosta: ......
Zola: Well? Immortal? All you need to do is destroy this dangerous knowledge and you'll be just like us, living on this world for eternity.
Morris: ...During a lifetime of research, I had always hoped that immortals existed. Such would be the ultimate being...
Aosta: (...Professor...indeed, if it's my professor from the past...)
Morris: ...the price to pay for immortality, is to leave this world in ignorance forever?
Charle: Morris!
Morris: Sorry, it appears I can't hold off until tomorrow. In one fell swoop, I'll have to——
Aosta: Foolish!
Aosta: To destroy knowledge that isn't useful to you, is the one prohibition of the school of Life Magic!
Aosta: The real Professor Dietrich would never do such a thing!
Zola: Who gave you permission to speak!? This is none of your business!
Aosta: Professor, I've betrayed you...
Morris: Worrying is of no use...
Morris: It appears I taught you well after all, Clovis.
Aosta: Wh......?
Morris: Charle, now! Activate it...in one fell swoop!
Charle: I was waiting for you to say that! I still have injured students to save!
Zola: Have you not learned your lesson!? In the face of the Forbidden Rune, your runes are useless——
Zola: How...how could this...
Charle: This is just in case of an emergency, you need to hold on!
Barbara: ...Ugh...
Annie: ......
Zola: Damn, I'll just have to use it again!
Zola: ...*cough*...*cough*...my body...
Charle: Initially, we wanted to wait until tomorrow, that way the backlash would be stronger. But it looks like it's working well. Wonderful.
Zola: ...*cough*...*cough*...since when did you...
Zola: ...So, that's how it is. You've been acting...all along...
Zola: Was it to get intel on the sect?
Aosta: Is she speaking the truth, Professor?
Morris: To gain knowledge, one naturally has to take risks.
Morris: Who knew Charle had such terrible interrogation skills? I had no choice but to throw out the "Forbidden Rune" as bait.
Charle: In the beginning, I was completely in the dark.
Charle: That was until I saw Morris teaching you that magic circle, then I understood what he was up to.
Morris: The Forbidden Rune is an incomplete rune. All one needs is to add a little design and the whole circle will turn back on the caster.
Morris: Just needs time and...
Morris: ——a helper who's a master of runes.
Zola: So, you've been walking around in the barrier...
Zola: I thought you were at your wits end, and yet you were secretly drawing a rune on the ground!?
Morris: Don't be mistaken. The key to making this a success was you insisting on casting it yourself.
Morris: And that was not only because you didn't trust me, but also due to your desire to make others suffer, am I right?
Zola: ...Urgh...
Morris: Hmph.
Morris: Since that's the case, your suffering is well deserved.
Aosta: Without a doubt, that style...
Aosta: Who I resurrected, was indeed the real Professor Dietrich.
Morris: Don't get excited just yet.  You've only temporarily succeeded. You're still not even close to meeting my expectations.
Aosta: Oh...
Morris: You better do some cramming and get your mind prepared——Clovis.
Aosta: ...Yes, Professor. As if my life depends on it.
Tica: Eh? Headmaster, you already defeated her?
Charle: Yup, we're fine. Come help me take the injured...
Zola: Finally, it has〜arrived〜!!!
Zola: Are you feeling good about yourself, having tricked me with that ace up your sleeve?
Zola: Now it's time for me to teach you, Dietrich.
Zola: Well, they call me the crazy joker, coming to gobble that ace right up!
Charle: Stop her, quick! She wants to turn herself into a Soul Energy bomb!
Tica: Waaaaaaah, she's gonna blow!
Angelia: If you don't stop, your body will also——
Zola: So what? Ever since Shirley left me, I've never felt happy living...
Zola: We'll die together!!!
Naya: No! She wants to take everybody down with her!
Charle: (I've got to stop this....!)

Model.Text: So, both headmasters have been taken hostage by the Dracontines?
Exactly! And Headmaster Balzac's injury is serious. If we wait any longer she's gonna go bye-bye. We've got to get in there and save them!
Absolutely not, Your Majesty. It could be a trap. The Rune Academy and Elio are working together to lure you in.
I'm telling you the truth!
I may screw around, but I wouldn't joke about the headmaster's life!
Hard to say, who knows you're not acting!?
...When I was in the desert, I saw the terrible things the Dracontines were capable of.
I understand General Feiz's concerns, but the Dracontines are the enemy of all that reside on this continent.
Take stock of the troops; we'll put everything into helping the Rune Academy.
As for Elio, we'll deal with that after this looming threat has been taken care of.
Yes, ma'am!
Your Majesty!
That's an order.
...Obeyed...
Tica, lead the way.
No problem〜Come with me!
Hehe, feeling the pain?
Relax, I'm very angry now, so I'll be real slow with the torture〜
Ugh!
Woman, didn't I say observe until the morning!?
You dumb idiot, you've ruined my experiment!
Quit using that face to order me around, Morris Dietrich!
Master Zola, it's not looking good!
...The Queen of the Kingdom of the Sun and her army?
Everyone in the Carlos family is the same, they'll do whatever it takes to steal from others...
I'll hand this honorable mission over to you, new Immortal.
Use this to blow all of those who know the secret of the Dracontines to pieces〜
This...?
Don't worry, the explosive range of this little thing won't hurt you. Just enough for their wretched deaths to serve as a warning.
Nothing but a fraud. Don't try any annoying, off-limit research now〜
Ah〜It'd be wonderful if no one dared come study at this Academy after this〜
What idiotic words...
What's idiotic is this world which knows nothing.
So long as they remain idiots, controlled by the sect like good little boys and girls〜
You...
It's not the monkey's turn to speak.
Well? Immortal? All you need to do is destroy this dangerous knowledge and you'll be just like us, living on this world for eternity.
...During a lifetime of research, I had always hoped that immortals existed. Such would be the ultimate being...
(...Professor...indeed, if it's my professor from the past...)
...the price to pay for immortality, is to leave this world in ignorance forever?
Morris!
Sorry, it appears I can't hold off until tomorrow. In one fell swoop, I'll have to——
Foolish!
To destroy knowledge that isn't useful to you, is the one prohibition of the school of Life Magic!
The real Professor Dietrich would never do such a thing!
Who gave you permission to speak!? This is none of your business!
Professor, I've betrayed you...
Worrying is of no use...
It appears I taught you well after all, Clovis.
Charle, now! Activate it...in one fell swoop!
I was waiting for you to say that! I still have injured students to save!
Have you not learned your lesson!? In the face of the Forbidden Rune, your runes are useless——
How...how could this...
This is just in case of an emergency, you need to hold on!
Damn, I'll just have to use it again!
...*cough*...*cough*...my body...
Initially, we wanted to wait until tomorrow, that way the backlash would be stronger. But it looks like it's working well. Wonderful.
...*cough*...*cough*...since when did you...
...So, that's how it is. You've been acting...all along...
Was it to get intel on the sect?
Is she speaking the truth, Professor?
To gain knowledge, one naturally has to take risks.
Who knew Charle had such terrible interrogation skills? I had no choice but to throw out the "Forbidden Rune" as bait.
In the beginning, I was completely in the dark.
That was until I saw Morris teaching you that magic circle, then I understood what he was up to.
The Forbidden Rune is an incomplete rune. All one needs is to add a little design and the whole circle will turn back on the caster.
Just needs time and...
——a helper who's a master of runes.
So, you've been walking around in the barrier...
I thought you were at your wits end, and yet you were secretly drawing a rune on the ground!?
Don't be mistaken. The key to making this a success was you insisting on casting it yourself.
And that was not only because you didn't trust me, but also due to your desire to make others suffer, am I right?
...Urgh...
Hmph.
Since that's the case, your suffering is well deserved.
Without a doubt, that style...
Who I resurrected, was indeed the real Professor Dietrich.
Don't get excited just yet.  You've only temporarily succeeded. You're still not even close to meeting my expectations.
Oh...
You better do some cramming and get your mind prepared——Clovis.
...Yes, Professor. As if my life depends on it.
Eh? Headmaster, you already defeated her?
Yup, we're fine. Come help me take the injured...
Finally, it has〜arrived〜!!!
Are you feeling good about yourself, having tricked me with that ace up your sleeve?
Now it's time for me to teach you, Dietrich.
Well, they call me the crazy joker, coming to gobble that ace right up!
Stop her, quick! She wants to turn herself into a Soul Energy bomb!
Waaaaaaah, she's gonna blow!
If you don't stop, your body will also——
So what? Ever since Shirley left me, I've never felt happy living...
We'll die together!!!
No! She wants to take everybody down with her!
(I've got to stop this....!)

This is none of your business! ","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Professor, I've betrayed you...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Worrying is of no use...","sfxName":"h0043_story_033","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_24_001","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It appears I taught you well after all, Clovis.","sfxName":"h0043_story_031","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Wh......?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Charle, now! Activate it...in one fell swoop!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I was waiting for you to say that! I still have injured students to save!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3228c3","IconName":"h3228c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Have you not learned your lesson!? In the face of the Forbidden Rune, your runes are useless\u2014\u2014","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3228c3","IconName":"h3228c3_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"How...how could this...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"This is just in case of an emergency, you need to hold on!","sfxName":"h0025_story_026","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_30_001","SpeakerName":"Barbara","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3198c4","IconName":"h3198c4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Ugh...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_30_002","SpeakerName":"Annie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0091c3","IconName":"h0091c3_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3228c3","IconName":"h3228c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Damn, I'll just have to use it again!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3228c3","IconName":"h3228c3_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...*cough*...*cough*...my body...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_32_001","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Initially, we wanted to wait until tomorrow, that way the backlash would be stronger. But it looks like it's working well. Wonderful.","sfxName":"h0025_story_016","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_32_002","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3228c3","IconName":"h3228c3_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...*cough*...*cough*...since when did you...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3228c3","IconName":"h3228c3_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...So, that's how it is. You've been acting...all along...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_33_001","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3228c3","IconName":"h3228c3_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Was it to get intel on the sect?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_33_002","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Is she speaking the truth, Professor?","sfxName":"h0005_story_019","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_33_003","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"To gain knowledge, one naturally has to take risks.","sfxName":"h0043_story_029","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_33_004","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Who knew Charle had such terrible interrogation skills? I had no choice but to throw out the \"Forbidden Rune\" as bait.","sfxName":"h0043_story_031","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_33_005","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"In the beginning, I was completely in the dark.","sfxName":"h0025_story_003","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_33_006","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That was until I saw Morris teaching you that magic circle, then I understood what he was up to.","sfxName":"h0025_story_021","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The Forbidden Rune is an incomplete rune. All one needs is to add a little design and the whole circle will turn back on the caster.","sfxName":"h0043_story_032","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_34_001","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Just needs time and...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2014\u2014a helper who's a master of runes.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3228c3","IconName":"h3228c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So, you've been walking around in the barrier...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_36_001","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3228c3","IconName":"h3228c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I thought you were at your wits end, and yet you were secretly drawing a rune on the ground!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_36_002","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Don't be mistaken. The key to making this a success was you insisting on casting it yourself.","sfxName":"h0043_story_005","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_36_003","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And that was not only because you didn't trust me, but also due to your desire to make others suffer, am I right?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_36_004","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3228c3","IconName":"h3228c3_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Urgh...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_36_005","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmph.","sfxName":"h0043_story_004","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Since that's the case, your suffering is well deserved.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_38_000","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Without a doubt, that style...","sfxName":"h0005_story_017","sfxVolume":0.7},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_38_001","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Who I resurrected, was indeed the real Professor Dietrich.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_39_000","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Don't get excited just yet.  You've only temporarily succeeded. You're still not even close to meeting my expectations.","sfxName":"h0043_story_029","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_39_001","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_39_002","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You better do some cramming and get your mind prepared\u2014\u2014Clovis.","sfxName":"h0043_story_005","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_39_003","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":".........","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_39_004","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Yes, Professor. As if my life depends on it.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_40_000","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Eh? Headmaster, you already defeated her?","sfxName":"h0010_story_021","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_40_001","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yup, we're fine. Come help me take the injured...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_40_002","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3228c3","IconName":"h3228c3_sp4","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Finally, it has\u301carrived\u301c!!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_41_000","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3228c3","IconName":"h3228c3_sp4","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Are you feeling good about yourself, having tricked me with that ace up your sleeve?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_41_001","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3228c3","IconName":"h3228c3_sp4","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Now it's time for me to teach you, Dietrich.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_42_000","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3348c4","IconName":"h3348c4_sp4","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Well, they call me the crazy joker, coming to gobble that ace right up!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_42_001","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Stop her, quick! She wants to turn herself into a Soul Energy bomb!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_43_000","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Waaaaaaah, she's gonna blow!","sfxName":"h0010_story_011","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_43_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If you don't stop, your body will also\u2014\u2014","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_43_002","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3348c4","IconName":"h3348c4_sp4","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So what? Ever since Shirley left me, I've never felt happy living...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_43_003","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3348c4","IconName":"h3348c4_sp4","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We'll die together!!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_44_000","SpeakerName":"Naya","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0018","IconName":"h0018s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"No! She wants to take everybody down with her!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##_44_001","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(I've got to stop this....!)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_005_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
